feed.title: Hemmelig Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix some typos and language issues in the README by @2franix in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/366
  • Update French translation by @2franix in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/363
  • Now uses the aggregate/daily endpoint for analytics

New Contributors

  • @2franix made their first contribution in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/366

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.3.1...v6.3.2

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Show maxViews after decrypting secret by @the-voidl in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/367
  • Removing the stats route & fetching the data from the analytics page

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.3.2...v6.4.0

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.4.1
entry.content:
a7f0bb4 - fix: decrement the view after clicking show secret <@bjarneo> d6f8f4f - fix: show privacy and terms only for mobile devices in the hamburger menu <@bjarneo> d6191e1 - chore: move hard coded strings to translation file <@bjarneo> 11c198c - refactor: ensure the file download looks better ux wise <@bjarneo> 8b06006 - fix: make enter on pw prompt work <@bjarneo> 4403bc9 - fix: space between title and text <@bjarneo> c4d910d - fix: add missing dot <@bjarneo> 8cf0a7e - feat: add prettier UI for unlocked secrets <@bjarneo> 3fccde5 - chore: make the views left look better <@bjarneo> 8b90367 - fix: remove decrement as it should show the initial number coming from the backend <@bjarneo>

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.4.0...v6.4.1
